## IBlockDragger interface

A block dragger interface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IBlockDragger 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.iblockdragger_interface.dispose_1_methodsignature.md) | Sever all links from this object and do any necessary cleanup. |
|  [drag(e, currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.iblockdragger_interface.drag_1_methodsignature.md) | Execute a step of block dragging, based on the given event. Update the display accordingly. |
|  [endDrag(e, currentDragDeltaXY)](./blockly.iblockdragger_interface.enddrag_1_methodsignature.md) | Finish a block drag and put the block back on the workspace. |
|  [getInsertionMarkers()](./blockly.iblockdragger_interface.getinsertionmarkers_1_methodsignature.md) | Get a list of the insertion markers that currently exist. Drags have 0, 1, or 2 insertion markers. |
|  [startDrag(currentDragDeltaXY, healStack)](./blockly.iblockdragger_interface.startdrag_1_methodsignature.md) | Start dragging a block. This includes moving it to the drag surface. |
